# Texts


1. Q. I weigh nothing, but you can still see me. If you put me in a bucket, I make the bucket lighter. What am I?

A. A hole!

Source: Brainzilla

2. Q. I am a word that begins with the letter I. If you add the letter A to me, I become a new word with a different meaning, but that sounds exactly the same. What word am I?

A. Isle (add A to make "Aisle")
